about_the_game:
Tactical RPG meets Dungeon Crawlers in Transfer Of Essence!
Choose a character, then fight, hide, and explore Vamprett’s manor in search of the fabled treasure!
Play the story from each character’s point of view to experience the story through their eyes.
Dynamic Action Point system. Think carefully and create your own play experience!
Remember you can Fight, Hide, or Run to advance, the choice is yours!

PLEASE READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING DEMO

In this demo version of the main game, you will view Jax Drix's beginning storyline in order to learn the basics of combat.
You will be able to unlock 1 other character and play through their chapter 1 before the end of the demo.
Demo data will NOT be transferred to the main game at this time.
Feedback received in this demo will be used to enhance the experience of the main game. Thank you for any and all support.

name: Transfer Of Essence Demo
short_description: A fantasy tactical rpg /dungeon crawler where you decide how to spend action points to proceed. Play through each character's experience of the events to find out the mystery behind what happened.
